text: Ia ti kamaghɨn fos, o? Ia uari isɨ, gumazitam a danɨngɨva, egh an akamɨn gɨn mangɨva, egh ia an ingangarir gumazibar otivigham. Kamaghɨra, ia arazir kuramɨn ingangarir gumazibar ikɨtɨ, a ia damightɨ ia aremegham. Egh ia Godɨn akam bareghɨva egh an gɨn mangɨva, ia an ingangarir gumazibar ikɨtɨ, a ia damightɨ, ia an damazimɨn deragham.
